Message:
I can’t get enough of
the noise, laughter,

and of course,
everyone’s sights locked onto
my circus troupemates and me!

There’s a festival in
a city famous for art.
It was apparently started by
musicians as a ritual ceremony
to mourn the dead.

But nowadays,
it’s become more like
an annual music festival,

with hundreds of visitors
coming from all over to see it.

The streets are alive with
traveling entertainers and dancers.

It’s a festival that can only be
experienced in this city of art.

How can I not
join in on the fun!

Right now, my circus troupemates
aren’t here with me,

but I’m more than enough
to put on a show that’ll set
the place on fire!
